method.name: Fuzzy Nearest Prototype classifier

reference.ref: J. M. Keller, M. R. Gray, and J. A. Givens, A fuzzy k-nearest neighbor algorithm, IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics, vol. 15, no. 4, pp. 580-585, 1985.

generalDescription.howWork: FuzzyNPC is a prototypical version of FuzzyKNN, where only one prototype per class is used (it is obtained as the mean of every instance of the class in the training data). This classifier is a faster but less accurate version of FuzzyKNN.

parameterSpec.param: M: M parameter in the distance function.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: FuzzyNPC-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.15818181818181815 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.09272727272727276 Correctly classified: 0.8418181818181818 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8315789473684211 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8315789473684211 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.8421052631578947 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8541666666666666 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.8020833333333334 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.166655701754386 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.018302041545220568 Correctly classified: 0.8333442982456141 Global N/C: 0.0
